name: guhIO
tagline: lean but powerful home automation ː local and safe on every linux machine

![guhIO Logo](http://guh.guru/downloads/press/guhIO.png)![connect your things at home!](http://guh.guru/downloads/media/connecttobase.png)

***
*guhIO* (/[guːh]/ - pronounced German and sounds like "*goo*") is an open source IoT server, which allows to control a lot of different devices from many different manufacturers. With the powerful rule engine you are able to connect any device and create individual scenes and behaviors for your home.

In order to use *guhIO* and find information you can take a look at following links:

* A detailed description how to install and getting started with the *guhIO* can be found in the [guh | github wiki](https://github.com/guh/guh/wiki). 
* A detailed documentation of the source code can be found in the [guh | developer documentation](http://dev.guh.guru/).
